rows.label: tev030201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Arwae about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev030201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Arwae if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Arwae what he did during the attack.

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Arwae about the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0001
rows.name:
The ship docked in NLA was traveling between our
homeworld and another planet, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0002
rows.name:
We charted a safe course we had taken many many
MANY many times before, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Our current plight seems inconceivable. There were no
problems with our engine or other instruments, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0004
rows.name:
But trying to puzzle it all out now does nothing but
work up my pizza hunger...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm positive I had the technical expertise, you know?
And I certainly had the know-how, correct?
But somehow I always fail my interviews...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0012
rows.name:
All I did was wait a day to show up for the interview
because it was raining. But were they okay with that?
Of course not![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0013
rows.name:
And another time they scheduled the interview for
lunchtime, so I had five pizzas delivered, okay?
No gratitude whatsoever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0016
rows.name:
I simply do not understand you humans and your
finickiness when it comes to interviews...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0027
rows.name:
We boarded as many citizens as we could and
evacuated to the waters to the south, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0028
rows.name:
We were concerned the enemy would attempt to take
either our technology or our lives, but strangely...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well, the Ganglion made no attempt to pursue us,
you know? None![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0030
rows.name: I can only surmise their interests may lay...elsewhere?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Despite having been told not to expect any further
Ganglion attacks, we're still here, aren't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0036
rows.name: The Ma-non remain in NLA, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Certainly, there are still a few minor technical hurdles
preventing us from leaving, yes? But for the most part,
we stay here because we we like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Arwae about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Arwae about recent developments.

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Arwae what he did during the attack.

rows.label: tev030201_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Arwae about the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1001
rows.name: What? Our ship, you say? Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1002
rows.name:
How do I know you will not use such information
for nefarious purposes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1003
rows.name:
You are only human, aren't you? And at the moment,
I have trouble seeing that as anything but but a flaw.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1008
rows.name:
I didn't know that humans could be as terrifying as
those monsters in the Ganglion, if that makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1009
rows.name:
I knew there were cultural barriers between us from
the interview process, right? But those gentlemen were
always civil, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1010
rows.name:
That nasty business with Alex was a a wake-up call,
wasn't it? I have to be more vigilant in the future...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1015
rows.name:
Our leaders insisted we board human citizens and take
them to safety, so I did as commanded, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1016
rows.name:
But I considered the order to be somewhat...ill-advised?
How could we be sure there were not others like Alex
among those we offered refuge?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1017
rows.name:
Scoundrels who would twist our hospitality into an
opportunity to sabotage our ship and eradicate our
very species?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1018
rows.name:
I hope you will forgive me for being so blunt, okay?
I struggle to regard you now with anything less than
complete caution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1025
rows.name:
Despite having been told not to to expect any further
Ganglion attacks, we're still here, aren't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1026
rows.name: The Ma-non remain in New LA, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1027
rows.name:
I do not know why our leaders insist we stay,
you know? I can't even fathom the reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030201_MSG1028
rows.name:
I long for my homeworld with every ounce of my
being. Surely you understand this?[ST:wait ]
